wikipedia_page.main:
Allan Jeffrey Shires (born 29 June 1948) is an English former footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for Southend United and Colchester United.
Allan Jeffrey Shires has a wife named Christine. They have three children; Darren, Dawn and Julie. Allan has two Son-in-Laws, Darren Yuille and Jeff Smith. He also has a Daughter-in-Law, Liezel. Allan Shires has six grandchildren; Angel Shires, Leon Shires, Billy Yuille, Louis Yuille, Katie Smith and Jennifer Smith.
